meanings.definition: The state or quality of lacking a face.
meanings.sent1: The facelessnesses of the mannequins made them look eerie.
meanings.sent2: The artist captured the facelessnesses of the crowd in his painting.
meanings.sent3: The facelessnesses of the emojis in the text message made it hard to understand the tone.
meanings.sent4: In the sea of facelessnesses, she struggled to find her own identity.
meanings.sent5: The facelessnesses of the ghosts in the haunted house sent shivers down her spine.

meanings.definition: The condition of being without a recognizable identity or individuality.
meanings.sent1: The facelessnesses of the masked protesters added to the mystery of the demonstration.
meanings.sent2: In a world of facelessnesses, she longed to stand out and be noticed.
meanings.sent3: The facelessnesses of the identical twins often led to mistaken identity pranks.
meanings.sent4: She felt lost in the facelessnesses of the big city, craving a sense of belonging.
meanings.sent5: The facelessnesses of the online avatars made it hard to distinguish one player from another.
